name: 平凡之路
lyric:
[00:00.00] 作曲 : 朴树
[00:00.183] 作词 : 韩寒/朴树
[00:11.850]徘徊着的 在路上的
[00:17.390]你要走吗 via via
[00:22.580]易碎的 骄傲着
[00:28.740]那也曾是我的模样
[00:34.500]沸腾着的 不安着的
[00:40.140]你要去哪 via via
[00:45.880]谜一样的 沉默着的
[00:51.030]故事你真的 在听吗
[00:55.910]我曾经跨过山和大海 也穿过人山人海
[01:01.390]我曾经拥有着的一切 转眼都飘散如烟
[01:07.040]我曾经失落失望 失掉所有方向
[01:13.250]直到看见平凡 才是唯一的答案
[01:31.640]当你仍然 还在幻想
[01:37.120]你的明天 via via
[01:42.710]她会好吗 还是更烂
[01:48.540]对我而言 是另一天
[01:52.780]我曾经毁了我的一切 只想永远地离开
[01:58.230]我曾经堕入无边黑暗 想挣扎无法自拔
[02:04.160]我曾经像你像他 像那野草野花
[02:09.990]绝望着 渴望着 也哭也笑着平凡着
[03:02.420]向前走 就这么走 就算你被给过什么
[03:07.810]向前走 就这么走 就算你被夺走什么
[03:13.550]向前走 就这么走 就算会错过什么
[03:19.250]向前走 就这么走 就算会
[03:23.890]我曾经跨过山和大海 也穿过人山人海
[03:29.210]我曾经拥有着的一切 转眼都飘散如烟
[03:34.940]我曾经失落失望 失掉所有方向
[03:41.040]直到看见平凡 才是唯一的答案
[03:46.420]我曾经毁了我的一切 只想永远地离开
[03:51.970]我曾经堕入无边黑暗 想挣扎无法自拔
[03:57.850]我曾经像你像他 像那野草野花
[04:03.400]绝望着 渴望着 亦哭亦笑着平凡着
[04:09.120]我曾经跨过山和大海 也穿过人山人海
[04:14.680]我曾经问遍整个世界 从来没得到答案
[04:20.410]我不过像你像他 像那野草野花
[04:26.210]冥冥中 这是我 唯一要走的路啊
[04:33.540]时间无言 如此这般 明天已在眼前
[04:44.730]风吹过的 路依然远 你的故事讲到了哪

name: 极乐净土
lyric:

[01:15.600]

[01:34.430]いつかちりゆくもの

[01:44.610]ちょっと「いいこと」をいたしましょう

[03:21.160]
[00:31.570]月光升起之时
[00:35.830]以点亮的红色灯笼

[00:42.310]轻巧地引出蝴蝶
[00:45.760]来稍微窥探观赏吧

[00:53.100]想找点乐子的话

[01:34.430]亦总将有凋零之日
[01:38.290]既然如此 今夜就

[01:44.610]稍微做点「好事」吧

name: Red
lyric:
[00:06.53]Loving him is like driving a new
[00:09.59]Maserati down a dead end street
[00:15.94]Faster than the wind, passionate as sin, ending so suddenly
[00:22.18]Loving him is like trying to change your mind
[00:25.37]once you're already flying through the free fall
[00:30.88]Like the colors in autumn, so bright, just before they lose it all
[00:37.95]Losing him was blue, like I've never known
[00:41.84]Missing him was dark grey, all alone
[00:45.48]Forgetting him was like trying to know somebody you never met
[00:53.16]But loving him was red
[01:01.12]loving him was red
[01:08.35]Touching him was like realizing
[01:10.70]All you ever wanted was right there in front of you
[01:15.74]Memorizing him was as easy as knowing
[01:19.20]all the words to your old favorite song
[01:23.08]Fighting with him was like trying to solve a crossword
[01:26.50]And realizing there's no right answer
[01:30.84]Regretting him was like wishing
[01:33.15]you'd never found out that love could be that strong
[01:39.49]Losing him was blue, like I've never known
[01:43.23]Missing him was dark grey, all alone
[01:46.86]Forgetting him was like trying to know somebody you never met
[01:54.56]loving him was red
[01:57.56]Oh, red.
[02:02.43]Burning Red.
[02:09.36]Remembering him comes in flashbacks, in echoes
[02:12.26]Tell myself it's time now, gotta let go
[02:17.47]But moving on from him is impossible
[02:20.56]when I still see it all in my head
[02:25.26]In burning red
[02:32:00]Burning, it was red
[02:28.88]
[02:39.70]Oh, Losing him was blue, like I've never known
[02:45.31]Missing him was dark grey, all alone
[02:48.90]Forgetting him was like trying to know somebody you never met
[02:56.59]'Couse loving him was red
[03:02.20]Burning Red.
[03:12.00]And that's why he's spinning around in my head
[03:15:80]Comes back to me, burning red
[03:27.10]His love was like driving a new Maserati down a dead end street
[00:01.09]
[00:02.42]
[00:06.53]爱上他就像
[00:09.59]驾驶着崭新的玛莎拉蒂往死路冲
[00:15.94]风驰电挚血脉喷张  却身先朝露
[00:22.18]爱上他就像
[00:25.37]高空跳伞自由落体  才开始后悔
[00:30.88]像严冬来临前的秋季  色彩缤纷但转瞬即逝
[00:37.95]失去他的心情是百思莫解的蓝色
[00:41.84]想念他是形单影只的深灰色
[00:45.48]而忘掉他就像想认识陌生人一样难
[00:53.16]但爱他的心是炽热的红色
[01:01.12]爱着他是红色的
[01:08.35]触摸到他就像是惊觉
[01:10.70]穷尽一生寻找的人原来就在眼前
[01:15.74]要想记住他就像
[01:19.20]记得你以前最爱的歌的歌词一样容易
[01:23.08]跟他吵架就像是想要解开
[01:26.50]没有正确答案的填字游戏
[01:30.84]后悔失去他就像
[01:33.15]希望你从未发现过爱能如此浓烈
[01:39.49]失去他是一头雾水的蓝色
[01:43.23]想念他是孤苦无依的深灰色
[01:46.86]而忘掉他就像想认识陌生人一样难
[01:54.56]但爱着他是鲜艳的红色
[01:57.56]红色
[02:02.43]火红色
[02:09.36]想起他时那闪回的记忆与回音
[02:12.26]都在提醒我是时候该放手了
[02:17.47]但是放下他何其困难
[02:20.56]因为一切的一切早已刻在脑中
[02:25.26]用的是心如火焚般的红色
[02:32:00]燃烧般的火红色
[02:39.70]失去他是不知就里的蓝色
[02:45.31]思念他是踽踽独行的深灰色
[02:48.90]而忘掉他就像想认识陌生人一样难
[02:56.59]因为爱他是鲜艳的红色
[03:02.20]是火烧般的红色
[03:12.00]所以他才在我脑海中盘旋
[03:15:80]那火焰般的红色  不停出现我眼前
[03:27.10]他的爱就像驾着崭新玛莎拉蒂往死路冲

name: Blue-Skies
lyric:
[00:12.180]We've been waiting
[00:14.230]Anticipating change coming our way
[00:20.540]You're my baby
[00:22.880]Two the bad nights
[00:24.770]two the brighter days
[00:28.780]I know that something good
[00:30.470]is waiting just around the corners
[00:32.770]There's a new day dawning
[00:34.910]There's a new life for us
[00:37.810]Got to keep on holding on
[00:39.460]for just a little long, I know
[00:45.000]That it's gonna be blue skies
[00:50.340]For you and I
[00:54.820]We'll step out of the shadows
[00:56.840]and walk into the light
[01:02.290]Yeah, it's gonna be blue skies
[01:07.720]For you and I
[01:12.050]But my heart beats slow
[01:14.320]as the storm carries on up high
[01:19.950]And the clouds roll by
[01:26.280]I can feel it
[01:28.440]It's coming fast and fierce and wild
[01:34.920]I can see it
[01:37.110]Everytime I look into those eyes
[01:43.130]Tell me is it really gonna storm again
[01:47.020]Will the sky turn dark, will the rain begin?
[01:51.620]I wanna be with you wherever
[01:53.870]lightering strikes, cause I know
[01:58.850]That it's gonna be blue skies
[02:04.230]For you and I
[02:08.510]We'll step out of the shadows
[02:10.860]and walk into the light
[02:16.230]Yeah, it's gonna be blue skies
[02:21.680]For you and I
[02:25.960]But my heart beats slow
[02:28.150]as the storm carries on up high
[02:33.620]And the clouds roll by
[02:38.060]And the clouds roll by
[02:43.300]I can't stand rain for one more day
[02:47.660]I know we can make it go away
[02:53.280]Can you fell it?
[02:55.330]Like a fever, burning till it breaks
[03:01.450]Blue skies
[03:05.090]For you and I
[03:09.430]We'll step out of the shadows
[03:11.720]and walk into the light
[03:17.050]Yeah, it's gonna be blue skies
[03:22.520]For you and I
[03:27.520]But my heart beats slow
[03:29.560]as the storm carries on up high
[03:35.440]And the clouds roll by
[03:37.180]Blue skies, Blue skies (And the clouds roll by)
[03:41.660]Blue skies, Blue skies (And the clouds roll by)
[03:46.230]Blue skies, Blue skies (And the clouds roll by)
[03:50.220]Blue skies, Blue skies (And the clouds roll by)
[00:12.180]我已等待许久
[00:14.230]你来改变我未来的道路
[00:20.540]我的宝贝
[00:22.880]在这厌烦的夜晚
[00:24.770]在这更刺眼的白天
[00:28.780]我知道美好的事物
[00:30.470]就躲藏在周围的角落里
[00:32.770]这就是那初升的曙光
[00:34.910]这就是我们生活的新篇章
[00:37.810]拥有它
[00:39.460]哪怕只有一小段时间，我深知
[00:45.000]蓝天即将到来
[00:50.340]你我并肩
[00:54.820]一起踏出阴影
[00:56.840]迎接光明
[01:02.290]是的，举头即蓝天
[01:07.720]低头仅你我
[01:12.050]但我的心缓缓跳动
[01:14.320]当这场风暴汹涌扑来
[01:19.950]云朵翻腾而起
[01:26.280]我能感到
[01:28.440]这无止息地吹刮着的激怒的风
[01:34.920]我终于明白
[01:37.110]每当我看着那双眼睛
[01:43.130]它告诉我风暴再次到来
[01:47.020]蓝天将要逝去？晴日是否要离开？
[01:51.620]无论何时何地我只想与你在一起
[01:53.870]让暴风雨来得更猛烈些吧! 因为我知道

[02:04.230]你我并肩

[02:10.860]迎接光明

[02:33.620]风起云涌
[02:38.060]风起云涌

[02:47.660]我知道我可以驱散它
[02:53.280]你感受到了吗
[02:55.330]就像发烧，烧至灰飞烟灭

[03:30.040]I knew you were trouble when you walked in

name: 我
lyric:
[00:00.00] 作曲 : 张国荣
[00:00.916] 作词 : 林夕
[00:02.750]作词：林夕
[00:04.050]I am what I am
[00:11.150]我永远都爱这样的我
[00:45.150]快乐是 快乐的方式不只一种
[00:55.450]最荣幸是 谁都是造物者的光荣
[01:05.850]不用闪躲 为我喜欢的生活而活
[01:16.850]不用粉墨 就站在光明的角落
[01:27.050]我就是我 是颜色不一样的烟火
[01:37.750]天空开阔 要做最坚强的泡沫
[01:48.350]我喜欢我 让蔷薇开出一种结果
[01:58.850]孤独的沙漠里 一样盛放的赤裸裸
[02:15.750]多么高兴 在琉璃屋中快乐生活
[02:26.550]对世界说 甚么是光明和磊落
[02:38.150]我就是我 是颜色不一样的烟火
[02:50.350]天空开阔 要做最坚强的泡沫
[03:01.050]我喜欢我 让蔷薇开出一种结果
[03:11.650]孤独的沙漠里 一样盛放的赤裸裸

name: Call Me Maybe
lyric:
[00:00.00] 作曲 : Carly Rae Jepsen, Josh Ramsay, Tavish Crowe
[00:01.00] 作词 : Carly Rae Jepsen, Josh Ramsay, Tavish Crowe
[00:04.460]I threw a wish in the well
[00:06.250]Don’t ask me I’ll never tell
[00:08.289]I looked to you as it fell
[00:10.250]and now you’re in my way
[00:12.600]I’d trade my soul for a wish
[00:14.279]Pennies and dimes – for a kiss
[00:16.289]I wasn’t looking for this
[00:18.700]But now you’re in my way
[00:20.590]Your stare was holding
[00:22.990]Ripped jeans – skin was showing
[00:23.980]Hot night – Wind was blowing
[00:26.000]Where d’ you think you’re going baby?
[00:28.410]Hey I just met you
[00:30.939]and this is crazy
[00:32.619]But here’s my number
[00:34.860]So, Call Me Maybe
[00:36.720]It’s hard to look right
[00:38.980]at you baby!
[00:40.900]But here’s my number
[00:42.769]So, Call Me Maybe
[00:44.680]Hey I just met you
[00:46.739]and this is crazy
[00:48.570]But here’s my number
[00:50.769]So, Call Me Maybe

[00:56.879]But here’s my number
[00:58.820]So, Call Me Maybe

[00:04.460]我将一个愿望投入许愿池中
[00:06.250]别问我,我绝不泄露
[00:08.289]它落下时我与你相遇
[00:10.250]如今你出现在我面前
[00:12.600]我用自己的灵魂交换一个愿望
[00:14.279]放弃了所有金钱只为了一个吻
[00:16.289]这可不是我想要的
[00:18.700]但是如今你出现在我的面前
[00:20.590]你眼神坚定
[00:22.990]牛仔裤上的破洞 展现出你的肌肤
